attributes.action: Introduce legislation to prevent retailers from lighting shops overnight to help combat climate change
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These measure would: 
1)Reduce energy usage
2)Reduce light pollution
In a carbon conscious world it is unreasonable to allow retailers to consume vast amounts of energy when it is unneeded.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
